Classes in org.gvsig.topology used by com.iver.cit.gvsig.drivers
ITopologyErrorContainer
          All classes that contains TopologyError must implement this interface.
 

Classes in org.gvsig.topology used by com.iver.utiles.swing.threads
ITopologyErrorContainer
          All classes that contains TopologyError must implement this interface.
ITopologyRule
          A topology rule checks that features' geometry of one or more layers verifies a given spatial condition.
Topology
          This class represents a Topology, as a group of vectorial layers and topology rules that checks geometries and their spatial relationships of these layers.
 

Classes in org.gvsig.topology used by org.gvsig.topology
AbstractTopologyRule
          Default implementation of ITopologyRule
IOneLyrRule
          Interface for all rules that applies to only one layer
ITopologyErrorContainer
          All classes that contains TopologyError must implement this interface.
ITopologyErrorFix
          Automatic error fix for a given topology error.
ITopologyRule
          A topology rule checks that features' geometry of one or more layers verifies a given spatial condition.
ITopologyStatus
          This interface has all posible status of a Topology in relation with its status of validation.
RuleNotAllowedException
          Exception launched when we try to add an incorrect rule to a Topology
Topology
          This class represents a Topology, as a group of vectorial layers and topology rules that checks geometries and their spatial relationships of these layers.
Topology.ITopologyStatusListener
          Interface for all of these classes interested in listening topology change status events.
Topology.TopologyStatusEvent
          Topology change status event.
TopologyError
          Error produced when one or many features dont pass a topology rule.
TopologyRuleDefinitionException
          Exception throwed when a topology rule is wrong defined.
